alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 2:06AM EDT until July 25 at 2:45AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CATTARAUGUS AND SOUTHERN ALLEGANY COUNTIES... At 206 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Allegany, or near Olean, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Olean, Wellsville, Allegany State Park, Alfred, Allegany, Cuba, St. Bonaventure, Whitesville, Weston Mills and Hinsdale. This includes Interstate 86 between exits 23 and 30. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
